name: The Hive Soundtrack Bundle
description:
The Hive Soundtrack Bundle includes:

  • The Hive
  • The Hive Soundtrack

Game setting
The Hive is an RTS RPG single player game where you assume control of insectoid hive mind, and explore the vast underworld on your journey to the surface.

The emphasis of the game is in exploration, discovery and story telling via the RTS style game play.

Features
  • Assume control as the Insectoid Hive mind. Explore a beautiful, vast and ruined underworld riddled with dangers and lost civilizations
  • Build your own underground nest and forces to defeat massive ancient creatures
  • Defeat enemies and dissolve their DNA to unlock new units and abilities
  • Equip your creatures with relics scavenged from the ruins of long lost civilizations



  • Experience an epic story that spans across the vast underworld of New Eden
  • Strategize your way to victory across 10 different levels and an estimated 10-12 hours of gameplay
  • The calming serenity of the blooming springs, the aggressive heat of volcanoes and the ruins holding a story of a sad history make up the world of Hive.
